body.name: Torjim 74” Camera Tripod with Travel Bag, Extendable Cell Phone Tripod Stand with Wireless Remote and Phone Holder, Compatible with All Cameras/iPhone/Android/Sport Camera
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Wide Compatibility】This camera tripod has a sturdy phone holder and 1/4 Universal Screw. And it can extend from 20.87 to 74in, this tripod fully for All Cameras(Nikon D3500/D7500, Canon m50 EOS rebel t6 t7, Olympus, Panasonic).

【Support All Shooting Angles】Thanks to its versatile pan head, It adjusts to multiple shooting angles in seconds, including landscape mode, portrait mode, low-angle shots, high-angle shots and 360 ̊ Panoramic Shot. Anyone can learn to be on camera and experience the fun of shooting.

【Universal Phone Holder & Wireless Remote】The phone holder with soft silicone pad is fully compatible with all 4.7"-6.8" iPhone and Android phones.Upgrade the sensor chip, the wireless remote control connects to the mobile phone in 1 second. Taking satisfactory photos and videos at a range of 33 feet/10 meters is a piece of cake.

【Sturdy & Stable】Made of premium high-quality materials (advanced aluminum alloy and ABS resin), it is super durable and stable. Non-slip feet provide a secure grip. A hanging weight on the counterweight hook provides additional stability and load carrying capacity. it also guarantees stability, wind and shock resistance.

【What You Get】1X Camera Tripod, 1X User Manual, 1X Bluetooth Remote Shutter, 1X Universal Phone Holder(2.8" to 5.7"). We will Provide 12 months of Free Warranty, and Lifetime Professional Customer Service. Any questions, Feel Free to Contact our Customer Service Staff.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 9,281 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded My Expectations
reviews.reviewText: This isn’t my first “cheap” tripod I’ve bought on Amazon, so I wasn’t expecting it to be anything exceptional because of the lower price. I was pleasantly surprised by how solid this tripod is for the price. The quick release mount is sturdy and solid holding both my phone’s weight and my camera’s weight. The remote shutter for the cellphone was a great addition, especially for the price of this tripod/shutter bundle. To hook it up to my phone (iPhone 15 Pro Max), I simply switched it on and went to my Bluetooth settings and hit the name of the device to connect it. It took me maybe a minute, tops. It’s a great addition for me because I’m a content creator so no more timer pictures, remote shutter works great and it’s small enough to conceal in my hands in photos. I actually used it yesterday along with my new tripod to take holiday photos of my boyfriend and I and it was great. I also like that the remote shutter has a spot so you can put it on a lanyard or keychain so you don’t have to worry about losing it in a pocket or bag. I will note that the tripod has a bit of weight to it compared to other cheap “lightweight” models so if you’re like me where you take it out on hikes, be prepared for it to add a bit of weight to your pack. For me it’s worth the extra weight to have a solidly made tripod that’s not going to break. I’d absolutely recommend this tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm an aspiring photographer aiming to be a professional. The tripod I received in my starter kit was okay. This tripod is absolutely a heavy steady Top of The Line necessity for every event indoor and outdoor that won't letcha down not fall down. It's sturdy and steady. Prepping it up is a breeze. Only takes a few minutes. Comes with a nice case. It has a remote control. You can easily adjust the height with 1 touch of the grips of each leg. No worries at all. My digital camera, Canon Rebel EOS T7 2000D is truly in safe hands. And this tripod is absolutely affordable. Great quality along with being a Great deal as well. Thank you very much for making this part of my life so much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny Tripod, HUGE Potential!
reviews.reviewText: This Torjim tripod packs a punch! Folds small, extends tall (74"!), & handles both my camera & phone. Wireless remote for solo shots is . Super stable, built tough, & travels light. Best. Tripod. Ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Review for non-pro's like myself.
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a great photographer, but I enjoy photography, want to take good pictures and want to get better at it. I can't attest to whether or not this tripod will meet the high demands of people that know what they're doing to a greater degree than myself, but I think my observations may be helpful to folks like myself.Most of us should have noticed that yhis tripod is just over 3lbs. Like myself, I suspect that some of you will not be able to picture this. But note... this is a pretty light weight tripod. Its intended to not be a burden to folks that will tote rhis around for half a day and it's successful in this regard. The manufacturer said that this had legs of greater thickness than usual, I'm skeptical of this, but I'm reassured by the square shape of the legs which typically add strength to any hollow tube of metal.I gave full marks for "sturdy", it is, but only 4 stars for stable, because extended all the way, it does creep me out a bit, as any 3lb tripod would. If I keep the bottom portion of the legs unexpected, I find it stable.I consider it well made for this price point, but I'm sure that a more expensive tripod would feel more premium and robust. The metals feel good and plastics seem premium to me and those "sponge" parts on the top extensions are appreciated, feels less cold and now round, good feel while carrying in the hands. "Sponge" seems premium and doesn't seem like it will degrade quickly.The swivel of the head feels "certain" albeit maybe a bit stiff, but this will likely normalize over time. Design is intuitive enough for even a novice to tripods like me to discover quickly.I do find that when I put the camera on, it skews ever so slightly to clockwise, but this seems to be a by-product of its new condition, I just pinch down the "base" it's sitting on while I snap the shutter and it's level every time.BUT this particular tripod has a brilliant feature that few models I've seen have. That hook under the main stem is perfect for hanging a heavy camera bag, making it REALLY stable in the process. My camera bag isnt heavy, but I keep a supermarket bag with me, place 3 rocks from the surroundings inside, hang it and feel brilliant as the wind blows, it makes that much of a difference! I could have gotten a much better tripod for $80 or $120 for sure, but I didn't want to spend that and I'm satisfied with what i got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the wide base and sturdy legs on this tripod. Setting up took slightly longer than expected, possibly due to the small instructions. After the initial attachments, the rest was intuitive. Adjusting the height and angle for recording was a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Tripod
reviews.reviewText: This tripod turned out to be better quality than I expected. None of the plastic parts feel cheaply made or fragile. It has simple conveniences like foam grips near the tops of the legs, a leveling bubble guide, and a handle that make moving and setting up the tripod easier. If you need a tripod that can elevate your camera above 6 ft this will do it. In my opinion, it was well worth the extra few dollars compared to other similarly priced, but cheaper, options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy and fast to set up, included phone holder works excellent for my Samsung! I also use it to hold my projector when I'm on the road, very stable.

Have used many times now and very happy with the quality and ease of use. Bag holds it fine with the remote being the only issue. I have an android and it connected to bluetooth fine but only one button works. Still works as intended and I'd recommend it.

For the price, this product has everything that an expensive model has got and is very sturdy, good build, living in the Arctic circle, exposing to cold temperatures of -30⁰ or lower, the plastic clips didn't freeze or crack.Worth the price and easy to use. Comes with a bag and remote to click pictures.

The media could not be loaded. I like the Tripod Kit, so stable and sturdy. The only thing I don't like and it seems to be an issue is the horizontal mount screw at the back of the cellphone clamp (see video). I am not sure if it is use for that purpose just like the screw interface using the vertical mount. It easily got loosen once it was clipped to the phone mount.Update: I messaged the seller regarding the phone mount issue and responded quickly. A replacement has been received and it fits perfectly to the very nice Tripod kit. Changed my rating from 4 to 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very decent tripod for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Well built and of decent quality, especially considering the price. However, it is a bit light and flimsy so you need to be careful, especially if using heavier equipment. A heavy camera can also make the height adjuster slowly descend. If you're looking for a solid professional tripod, this isn't it, but those will run you hundreds of dollars. This is perfect for occasional use, and especially if you want to use it with a phone, but works well with a full camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent quality as per my requirements
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, smoothly adjustable, a perfect gift
